original_definition: 'non-automatic tumble drier' means a tumble drier which switches off the drying process after a predefined period, usually controlled by a timer, but which may also be manually switched off;
generated_definition: 'non-automatic tumble drier' means a type of tumble dryer that is not powered by electricity or gas and instead relies on gravity and heat generated by the user to dry clothes.

Article 10: whether the household tumble drier is an ‘automatic tumble drier’ or ‘non-automatic tumble drier’;
whether thehousehold tumble drieris an ‘automatic tumble drier’ or ‘non-automatic tumble drier’;
